titles.title: CB 140 We Give Thanks To Thee, O Lord
Psalm 75:1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WE GIVE THANKS TO THEE, O LORD,
We give thanks.
We give thanks to Thee, O Lord,
We give thanks.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For Thy name is near,
Thy wondrous works men declare.
We give thanks to Thee, O Lord,
We give thanks.
